Utilities¶

olimex.utils.calculate_values_from_packet_data(data)¶

Return a list of the 6 channel values parsed from the packet data.

Parameters:data –
Return type:list
Data sent from the Olimex shield is in the following form:
uint16_t   data[6];

Each uint16_t holds a 10-bit sample (= 0 - 1023) in big endian (Motorola) format.

However the data argument, passed in a call to this function, contains a list of length 12; each item in the list is a bytes() of length 1.
